author: fakedev9999
content:
Hi guys I'm from Kroma, an Ethereum L2, and we are building an open source ZKP accelerating library called "Tachyon". We've published a medium article explaning what it is and why we need it. I would really appreciate having a look at our repo and a star please!
github: https://github.com/kroma-network/tachyon
medium: https://medium.com/kroma-network/why-tachyon-7f6201e9029b
